name: Mission 4879
description:
Short lore:
After emergency landing on an unknown planet, you are attacked by a swarm of monsters.
Apparently these monsters were more interested in your spaceship rather than yourself and you're still alive!
Now that you had enough time to prepare yourself for the battle, it's your turn to fight, break through the swarm, reclaim and rebuild your ship and run away from this nasty place.

Game objective:
- Find and bring back 8 spaceship parts.

Game hints:
- You may die when attacked by monsters.
- Monsters may attack your spaceship while you're away searching for parts. Focus on clearing out the swarm when its too close to the spaceship.
- Monster swarms appear in waves. Use the time between the waves to find missing parts, and protect the spaceship when the next wave starts.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Programmers:
Norbert Błaszczyk (Whigle)
Krzysztof Dziembowski (Chant)
Marcin Zieliński (Ziel0n)

Enviro Artist:
Wojciech Świerk (Wojciej)

Sound Designer:
Marcin Rusinowski (tooloud)
